items.title: Chrome http to https
items.summary: Chrome http to https 问题描述 google浏览器自动将图床http转为https，导致图片无法显示 解决方案 1. 点击访问链接的小锁图标 2. 点击网站设置
items.content_html:
Chrome http to https

问题描述

google浏览器自动将图床http转为https，导致图片无法显示

解决方案

1. 点击访问链接的小锁图标

2. 点击网站设置

3. 修改图中设置为允许

items.title: install ventoy
items.summary: install ventoy Ventoy is an open-source tool for creating bootable USB drives, and its main function is to assist us in installing the system. Advantages: The software is compact, with a Windows version of less than 15MB and a Linux version of 18MB, which is much smaller than the traditional WINPE with hundreds of MB. Compared to traditional PE, deployment is faster,. Installing the system is simple and effortless. Copy the Windows or Linux image directly to the USB drive in advance, and then boot from the USB drive to provide you with a selectable system list option. Click on which system you want to install.
items.content_html:
install ventoy

Ventoy is an open-source tool for creating bootable USB drives, and its main function is to assist us in installing the system. Advantages: The software is compact, with a Windows version of less than 15MB and a Linux version of 18MB, which is much smaller than the traditional WINPE with hundreds of MB. Compared to traditional PE, deployment is faster,. Installing the system is simple and effortless. Copy the Windows or Linux image directly to the USB drive in advance, and then boot from the USB drive to provide you with a selectable system list option. Click on which system you want to install.

step1 download

step2 choose system

step3 unzip

step4 start(double click)

step5 choose disk and click install

step6 finish

step7 put iso to ventoy disk
